EmailTemplate.name: Denied Email Imagine U
EmailTemplate.subject: Class Registration Error
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Our records show you do not qualify* for {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_Name__c} on {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_Start_DateTime__c} - {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_End_DateTime__c} with the Imagine Institute.
If you feel this is an error please call us at 206-492-5249 or email training@imaginewa.org.
Thank you,
-The Imagine Institute
www.imaginewa.org
----
Nuestros archivos indican que no califica* para {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_Name__c} en {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_Start_DateTime__c} - {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_End_DateTime__c} con El Instituto Imagine.
Si ud cree que es un error favor de comunicarse al 206-492-5249 O por correo electronico training@imaginewa.org.
-El Instituto Imagine
www.imaginewa.org
{!$Setup.c501_cm__Imagine_Settings__c.c501_cm__Email_SMS_Unsub_Text__c}
